analyzed: mgrin par nyi ma la rin chen dbang mo'i ri'o //
translated: In the throat, Ratnasambhava is in the sun, ri.

original: gsang bar ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la rdo rje sems dpa' aam zhes pa ste sku'i rgyas gdab pa la lha rnams kyi rgyas gdab pa'o zhes pa nges pa'o //
analyzed: gsang bar ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la rdo rje sems dpa' aam zhes pa ste sku'i rgyas gdab pa la lha rnams kyi rgyas gdab pa'o zhes pa nges pa'o //
translated: The seal of the body is the seal of the deities.

original: srog gis rgyas gdab pa la ni lte bar li dang snying khar au dang mgrin par ri dang dpral bar ai dang gtsug tor du aa ste sa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: srog gis rgyas gdab pa la ni lte bar li dang snying khar au dang mgrin par ri dang dpral bar ai dang gtsug tor du aa ste sa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la dgod par bya'o //
translated: In the seal of the life-force, li is placed at the navel, u at the heart, ri at the throat, i at the forehead, and a at the crown.

original: de bzhin du thugs kyi thig le'i rgyas gdab pa la ni dpral bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la aom dang mgrin par nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la a'a: dang snying gar sgra gcan gyi dkyil 'khor la h'um dang lte bar dus me'i dkyil 'khor la ho'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du thugs kyi thig le'i rgyas gdab pa la ni dpral bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la aom dang mgrin par nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la a'a: dang snying gar sgra gcan gyi dkyil 'khor la h'um dang lte bar dus me'i dkyil 'khor la ho'o //
translated: In the same way, in the seal of the bindu of the mind, oṃ is on a moon mandala at the forehead, āḥ is on a sun mandala at the throat, hūṃ is on a Rāhu mandala at the heart, and hoḥ is on a kālāgni mandala at the navel.

original: de bzhin du ye shes kyi rgyas gdab pa la aa yig ni gdod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgro'o zhes pas rdo rje nor bu la aa zhes pa grub pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du ye shes kyi rgyas gdab pa la aa yig ni gdod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgro'o zhes pas rdo rje nor bu la aa zhes pa grub pa'o //
translated: Likewise, the seal of pristine awareness is stated in the line “The letter A is the nail of all dharmas because it is unborn from the beginning,” which establishes the letter A in the vajra jewel.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes rnams kyis rgyas gdab pa'o //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes rnams kyis rgyas gdab pa'o //
translated: This is the seal of body, speech, mind, and pristine awareness.

original: da ni zhal gyi dbye ba gsungs pa rdo rje rnams kyis zhes pa la sogs pa ste 'dir rigs gcig dang / rigs gsum dang / rigs lnga dang / rigs drug gis rdo rjer gsungs shing rdo rje de rnams kyis zhal gyi dbye bar 'gyur te @188b rigs gcig gis zhal gcig dang rigs gsum gyis dag pa zhal gsum dang rigs lnga dag pa zhal lngar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: da ni zhal gyi dbye ba gsungs pa rdo rje rnams kyis zhes pa la sogs pa ste 'dir rigs gcig dang / rigs gsum dang / rigs lnga dang / rigs drug gis rdo rjer gsungs shing rdo rje de rnams kyis zhal gyi dbye bar 'gyur te @188b rigs gcig gis zhal gcig dang rigs gsum gyis dag pa zhal gsum dang rigs lnga dag pa zhal lngar 'gyur ro //
translated: Now, the division of faces is stated in the line “The vajras have,” and so on. Here, the vajras are stated to be of one type, three types, five types, and six types. Those vajras have a division of faces: the vajra of one type has one face, the vajra of three types has three faces, and the vajra of five types has five faces.

original: rigs drug gis dag pa zhal drug tu 'gyur te 'jigs zhes so //
analyzed: rigs drug gis dag pa zhal drug tu 'gyur te 'jigs zhes so //
translated: The vajra of six types has six faces, which are stated to be “frightening.”

original: de bzhin du zhal brgyad pa la sogs pa nas ha l'a ha la gdong brgya pa'i bar du khams rnams kyi dag pa gtso bor 'gyur ro zhes pa rgyud gzhan du nges pa ste rgyal ba'i bdag po'i'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du zhal brgyad pa la sogs pa nas ha l'a ha la gdong brgya pa'i bar du khams rnams kyi dag pa gtso bor 'gyur ro zhes pa rgyud gzhan du nges pa ste rgyal ba'i bdag po'i'o //
translated: Similarly, the purification of the elements is primary in the case of the eight-faced and so forth up to the one hundred-faced Hālāhala, as is stated in other tantras, that of the Lord of Conquerors.

original: de bzhin du dus kyi 'khor lo la dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po yang gcig la sogs pa mtha' yas zhal dang phyag dang zhabs mang du ma'i kha dog dang ni mun pa'i mthar zhes pa la sogs pa sgrub thabs kyi le'u las gsungs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du dus kyi 'khor lo la dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po yang gcig la sogs pa mtha' yas zhal dang phyag dang zhabs mang du ma'i kha dog dang ni mun pa'i mthar zhes pa la sogs pa sgrub thabs kyi le'u las gsungs so //
translated: Similarly, in the Kālacakra, the lord of the mandala is said to have an infinite number of faces, hands, and feet, and colors, in the chapter on the means of accomplishment: “one, and so forth, with many faces, hands, and feet, and with many colors, up to the end of the dark.”

original: 'dir phyag nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'i phyag rnams kyi dbye ba ni dbyangs kyi dbye ba yis zhes pa la ha h'a hi h'i hri hr'i hu h'u zhes pa ni nag po brgyad de mun pa'i yon tan las so //
analyzed: 'dir phyag nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'i phyag rnams kyi dbye ba ni dbyangs kyi dbye ba yis zhes pa la ha h'a hi h'i hri hr'i hu h'u zhes pa ni nag po brgyad de mun pa'i yon tan las so //
translated: Here, the classification of the twenty-four hands is stated in the chapter on the means of accomplishment: “By the classification of the vowels,” and so forth. “ Ha, ha, hi, hi, hrīṃ, hrīṃ, hu, hu,” are the eight black ones, from the quality of darkness.

original: ha h'a he hee har h'a ra ho hoo zhes pa ni dmar po brgyad de rdul gyi yon tan las so //
analyzed: ha h'a he hee har h'a ra ho hoo zhes pa ni dmar po brgyad de rdul gyi yon tan las so //
translated: “ Ha, ha, he, he, ai, ai, ho, ho,” are the eight red ones, from the quality of dust.

original: hha hh'a hya hy'a hra hr'a hwa hw'a zhes pa ni dkar po brgyad de snying stobs kyi yon tan las so zhes pa dus kyi 'khor lo'i'o //
analyzed: hha hh'a hya hy'a hra hr'a hwa hw'a zhes pa ni dkar po brgyad de snying stobs kyi yon tan las so zhes pa dus kyi 'khor lo'i'o //
translated: The eight white ones are ha ha ha ha hya hya hra hra, which are from the quality of sattva.🔽 Thus, the eight yellow ones are ham ha ha li ha la ha la ha la, which are from the quality of rajas.🔽 The eight red ones are ha ha ha ha hya hya hra hra, which are from the quality of tamas.🔽 The eight black ones are ha ha ha ha hya hya hra hra, which are from the quality of sattva.

original: de bzhin du sna tshogs yum gyi ni yon tan thams cad las ham ha: hli hl'i ha la h'a la hla hl'a zhes pa ser po brgyad de ye shes kyi zhal gyi rang bzhin las so zhes pa nges pa'o //🔽de nyid rnams kyis phyag rgya'i rab tu dbye ba zhes pa ni a'a a'i r'i a'u l'i aa: zhes pa nam mkha' dang rlung dang me dang chu dang sa dang ye shes kyi dbye ba ste lha'i tshogs thams cad kyi rgyas gdab pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du sna tshogs yum gyi ni yon tan thams cad las ham ha: hli hl'i ha la h'a la hla hl'a zhes pa ser po brgyad de ye shes kyi zhal gyi rang bzhin las so zhes pa nges pa'o // de nyid rnams kyis phyag rgya'i rab tu dbye ba zhes pa ni a'a a'i r'i a'u l'i aa: zhes pa nam mkha' dang rlung dang me dang chu dang sa dang ye shes kyi dbye ba ste lha'i tshogs thams cad kyi rgyas gdab pa'o //
translated: The eight variegated ones are ha ha ha ha hya hya hra hra, which are from the quality of tamas.🔽 The eight white ones are ha ha ha ha hya hya hra hra, which are from the quality of sattva.🔽 The eight yellow ones are ham ha ha li ha la ha la ha la, which are from the quality of rajas.🔽 The eight red ones are ha ha ha ha hya hya hra hra, which are from the quality of tamas.🔽 The eight black ones are ha ha ha ha hya hya hra hra, which are from the quality of sattva.🔽 The eight variegated ones are ha ha ha ha hya hya hra hra, which are from the quality of tamas.

original: gzhan yang de bzhin du sku'i rgyas gdab pa aom dang gsung gi rgyas gdab pa a'a: dang thugs kyi rgyas gdab pa h'um dang ye shes kyi rgyas gdab pa ho'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang de bzhin du sku'i rgyas gdab pa aom dang gsung gi rgyas gdab pa a'a: dang thugs kyi rgyas gdab pa h'um dang ye shes kyi rgyas gdab pa ho'o //
translated: The eight white ones are ha ha ha ha hya hya hra hra, which are from the quality of sattva.🔽 The eight yellow ones are ham ha ha li ha la ha la ha la, which are from the quality of rajas.🔽 The eight red ones are ha ha ha ha hya hya hra hra, which are from the quality of tamas.🔽 The eight black ones are ha ha ha ha hya hya hra hra, which are from the quality of sattva.🔽 The eight variegated ones are ha ha ha ha hya hya hra hra, which are from the quality of tamas.🔽 The eight white ones are ha ha ha ha hya hya hra hra, which are from the quality of sattva.🔽 The eight yellow ones are ham ha ha li ha la ha la ha la

original: rigs gcig gi rgyas gdab pa gzhom du med pa'i aa yig go zhes pa ste de ltar rigs drug dang rigs lnga dang rigs bzhi dang rigs gsum dang rigs gcig gis rgyas gdab pa ni sum cu rtsa drug sbyor ba'i rgyud rnams la'o //
analyzed: rigs gcig gi rgyas gdab pa gzhom du med pa'i aa yig go zhes pa ste de ltar rigs drug dang rigs lnga dang rigs bzhi dang rigs gsum dang rigs gcig gis rgyas gdab pa ni sum cu rtsa drug sbyor ba'i rgyud rnams la'o //
translated: Thus, the seal of the six classes, the seal of the five classes, the seal of the four classes, the seal of the three classes, and the seal of the one class are in the tantras of the thirty-six unions.

original: dpag med yon tan yi ge du ma'i rab tu dbye ba can te rgyud sna tshogs pa yi ge so so'i ming can zhes pa ka rdo rje dang kha rdo rje dang kha rdo rje dang gha rdo rje dang nga rdo rje'o //
analyzed: dpag med yon tan yi ge du ma'i rab tu dbye ba can te rgyud sna tshogs pa yi ge so so'i ming can zhes pa ka rdo rje dang kha rdo rje dang kha rdo rje dang gha rdo rje dang nga rdo rje'o //
translated: The one with the divisions of many syllables, which has immeasurable good qualities, is the various tantras that have the names of individual syllables, such as the syllable Ka Vajra, the syllable Kha Vajra, the syllable Ga Vajra, the syllable Gha Vajra, and the syllable Nga Vajra.

original: de bzhin du yi ge sum cu rtsa drug gi bar du tsa yig la sogs pa'i ming can mnyam pa'i rigs zhes pa shes rab kyi rgyud dang mi mnyam pa'i rigs zhes pa @189a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du yi ge sum cu rtsa drug gi bar du tsa yig la sogs pa'i ming can mnyam pa'i rigs zhes pa shes rab kyi rgyud dang mi mnyam pa'i rigs zhes pa @189a * //
translated: Similarly, up to the thirty-six syllables, which have the names of the syllables Ca and so on, are the equal classes, which are the wisdom tantras, and the unequal classes, which are the method tantras.

original: thabs kyi rgyud la lha dang lha mo rnams kyis rgyas gdab pa'i nges pa ste phyi rol du lag gdub la sogs pa dang nang du sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: thabs kyi rgyud la lha dang lha mo rnams kyis rgyas gdab pa'i nges pa ste phyi rol du lag gdub la sogs pa dang nang du sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid do //
translated: In the method tantras, the ascertainment is that the seed syllables are sealed by the deities and goddesses, externally as bracelets, and so on, and internally as the nature of the buddhas.

original: da ni sngags kyi lha rnams kyi skyed pa'i rim pa la skye ba'i rnam par dag pa gsungs pa sa bon zhes pa la sogs pa ste ;
analyzed: da ni sngags kyi lha rnams kyi skyed pa'i rim pa la skye ba'i rnam par dag pa gsungs pa sa bon zhes pa la sogs pa ste ;
translated: Now, the pure creation of the birth of the mantras’ deities is explained with “the seed,” and so on.

original: 'dir ji ltar mngal 'dzin pa na byang chub sems kyi rten dang bcas pa kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa gcig pu yul chos kyi khams dang gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa ni dpa' bo gcig par gsungs te /
analyzed: 'dir ji ltar mngal 'dzin pa na byang chub sems kyi rten dang bcas pa kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa gcig pu yul chos kyi khams dang gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa ni dpa' bo gcig par gsungs te /
translated: Here, just as when the womb is grasped, the sole all-basis consciousness, which is the support of the bodhicitta, is mixed as one with the object, the element of phenomena, and is said to be the “sole hero.”

original: rang 'od kyi shes rab ni skye ba po'i khongs su gtogs so //
analyzed: rang 'od kyi shes rab ni skye ba po'i khongs su gtogs so //
translated: The wisdom of one’s light is included in the “born.”

original: de bzhin du lha ni ka yig gcig pus dpa' bo gcig par grub bo //
analyzed: de bzhin du lha ni ka yig gcig pus dpa' bo gcig par grub bo //
translated: Similarly, the deity is established as the “sole hero” with the single syllable ka.

original: phyi nas sa bon de rdul la ro mnyam pa ni shes rab ma yis 'khyud par 'gyur zhes pa ni de'i bag chags las rnam par shes pa'i phung po shes rab kyis 'khyud pa k'a zhes par 'gyur te /
analyzed: phyi nas sa bon de rdul la ro mnyam pa ni shes rab ma yis 'khyud par 'gyur zhes pa ni de'i bag chags las rnam par shes pa'i phung po shes rab kyis 'khyud pa k'a zhes par 'gyur te /
translated: Later, the seed is of the same taste as the dust, and is embraced by the consort of wisdom. From its latent impressions, the aggregate of consciousness becomes embraced by wisdom, and becomes the syllable ka.

original: bzhi pa'i sbyor ba las so zhes pa nges pa'o //
analyzed: bzhi pa'i sbyor ba las so zhes pa nges pa'o //
translated: This is the ascertainment from the fourth application.

original: de bzhin du phung po lnga rdzogs pa ni mngal du lnga yi bdag nyid de de bzhin du lha yang lnga'i bdag nyid can k'a ki kr'i ku kli zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du phung po lnga rdzogs pa ni mngal du lnga yi bdag nyid de de bzhin du lha yang lnga'i bdag nyid can k'a ki kr'i ku kli zhes pa'o //
translated: In the same way, the perfection of the five aggregates is the fivefold nature in the womb, and likewise the fivefold nature of the deity is ka ki ki ka ki.

original: de bzhin du rus pa dang gsher ba dang dro ba dang g-yo ba'i chos skyes pa na phung po dang khams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa mngal du dgu'i bdag nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du lha yang k'a ki k'i kri kr'i ku k'u kli kl'i zhes pa
analyzed: de bzhin du rus pa dang gsher ba dang dro ba dang g-yo ba'i chos skyes pa na phung po dang khams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa mngal du dgu'i bdag nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du lha yang k'a ki k'i kri kr'i ku k'u kli kl'i zhes pa
translated: In the same way, when the dharmas of bone, moisture, heat, and movement are born, the consecration by the aggregates and constituents is the ninefold nature in the womb, and likewise the ninefold nature of the deity is ka ki ki ka ki ki ka ki ka ki ka.

original: grub pa / de bzhin du ngag dang lag pa dang rkang pa dang bshang lam rdzogs pa na sngar gyi phung po dang khams dang bcas pa bcu gsum gyi bdag nyid de las kyi dbang po rdzogs pa na byis pa ji lta ba de bzhin du lha yang k'a ki k'i🔽kri kr'i ku k'u kli kl'i kya kra kwa kla zhes pa'o //
analyzed: grub pa / de bzhin du ngag dang lag pa dang rkang pa dang bshang lam rdzogs pa na sngar gyi phung po dang khams dang bcas pa bcu gsum gyi bdag nyid de las kyi dbang po rdzogs pa na byis pa ji lta ba de bzhin du lha yang k'a ki k'i kri kr'i ku k'u kli kl'i kya kra kwa kla zhes pa'o //
translated: Similarly, when the speech, hands, feet and anus are complete, then the self of thirteen consisting of the previously mentioned aggregates and elements is complete.

original: nang du yul skyes pa na sngar gyi phung po la sogs pa dang lhan cig mngal du bcu dgu'i bdag nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du lha yang k'a ki k'i kri kr'i ku k'u kli kl'i kya kra kwa kla k'a kee k'a ra koo la ka:zhes pa'o
analyzed: nang du yul skyes pa na sngar gyi phung po la sogs pa dang lhan cig mngal du bcu dgu'i bdag nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du lha yang k'a ki k'i kri kr'i ku k'u kli kl'i kya kra kwa kla k'a kee k'a ra koo la ka:zhes pa'o
translated: When the organs of action are complete, then the child is like the god kākī kī kākī kī kṛkī kī kūrī kī kūrī kī kṛkī kī kūrī kī kūrī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī kī kākī k

original: // de nas mig la sogs pa skyes pa na byis pa skyes pa nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du lha yang k'a ki k'i kri kr'i ku k'u kli kl'i kya kra kwa kla k'a kee k'a ra koo k'a la ki: ki ke kar
analyzed: // de nas mig la sogs pa skyes pa na byis pa skyes pa nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du lha yang k'a ki k'i kri kr'i ku k'u kli kl'i kya kra kwa kla k'a kee k'a ra koo k'a la ki: ki ke kar
translated: Then, when the eyes and so forth are produced, just as the child is born with twenty-five natures, likewise the god is also born with the natures of the vowels and consonants.

original: ko ka la kam zhes pa'o //
analyzed: ko ka la kam zhes pa'o //
translated: The vowels are: a a i i u u e ai o au aṃ aḥ.🔽The consonants are: ka kha ga gha ṅa, ca cha ja jha ña, ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa, ta tha da dha na, pa pha ba bha ma, ya ra la va, śa ṣa sa ha, kṣa.🔽Then, when the five action faculties are applied, and the activities of speaking, grasping, walking, defecating, and urinating are produced, the child has thirty-two natures. Likewise, the god also has the natures of the vowels and consonants.

original: de nas las kyi dbang po lnga'i sbyor bas brjod pa dang / len pa dang / 'gro ba dang / bshang ba dang / gci ba'i bya ba skyes pa na byis pa @189b sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid de de bzhin du lha yang k'a ki k'i kri kr'i ku k'u kli kl'i kha kh'a kya ky'a kra kr'a kwa kl'a kla kl'a ka k'a ke kee ka ra ko koo ka
analyzed: de nas las kyi dbang po lnga'i sbyor bas brjod pa dang / len pa dang / 'gro ba dang / bshang ba dang / gci ba'i bya ba skyes pa na byis pa @189b sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid de de bzhin du lha yang k'a ki k'i kri kr'i ku k'u kli kl'i kha kh'a kya ky'a kra kr'a kwa kl'a kla kl'a ka k'a ke kee ka ra ko koo ka
translated: The vowels are as before. The consonants are: ka kha ga gha ṅa, ca cha ja jha ña, ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa, ta tha da dha na, pa pha ba bha ma, ya ra la va, śa ṣa sa ha, kṣa.

original: la k'a la kam ka: zhes pa ste lo bcu gnyis kyi mtshams rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: la k'a la kam ka: zhes pa ste lo bcu gnyis kyi mtshams rdzogs pa'o //
translated: This completes the twelve years.

original: de nas lo bcu drug gi mtshams su ji ltar byis pa'i khu ba 'pho ba na bzhi pa'i gnas skabs su 'gyur zhing bzhi pa de nyid sku bzhi pa de nyid sku bzhi pa dang phung po drug pa dang khams drug pa dang dbang po drug pa dang
analyzed: de nas lo bcu drug gi mtshams su ji ltar byis pa'i khu ba 'pho ba na bzhi pa'i gnas skabs su 'gyur zhing bzhi pa de nyid sku bzhi pa de nyid sku bzhi pa dang phung po drug pa dang khams drug pa dang dbang po drug pa dang
translated: Then, at the age of sixteen, when the child’s semen is emitted, it becomes the fourth stage. That fourth stage becomes the four bodies, the six aggregates, the six constituents, the six sense faculties,

original: yul drug pa dang las kyi dbang po drug pa dang las kyi dbang po'i bya ba drug par 'gyur te /
analyzed: yul drug pa dang las kyi dbang po drug pa dang las kyi dbang po'i bya ba drug par 'gyur te /
translated: the six objects, the six action faculties, and the six actions of the action faculties.

original: de ltar phung po drug dang khams drug dang skye mched bcu gnyis dang las kyi dbang po drug dang las kyi dbang po'i bya ba drug ste de ltar khams sum cu rtsa drug ni sum cu rtsa bdun pa ye shes dang thugs kyi rten du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar phung po drug dang khams drug dang skye mched bcu gnyis dang las kyi dbang po drug dang las kyi dbang po'i bya ba drug ste de ltar khams sum cu rtsa drug ni sum cu rtsa bdun pa ye shes dang thugs kyi rten du gyur pa'o //
translated: Thus, the six aggregates, the six constituents, the twelve sense bases, the six action faculties, and the six actions of the action faculties—in this way, the thirty-six constituents become the support of the thirty-seventh, gnosis, and the mind.

original: de bzhin du lha rdzogs pa la ka k'a ki k'i kri kr'i ku k'u kli kl'i kam ka: zhes pa ni phung po dang khams bcu gnyis so //
analyzed: de bzhin du lha rdzogs pa la ka k'a ki k'i kri kr'i ku k'u kli kl'i kam ka: zhes pa ni phung po dang khams bcu gnyis so //
translated: Similarly, in the complete deity, “ka ka ki ki kro kro khe khe kaṃ kaḥ” are the twelve aggregates and constituents.

original: kha kh'a kya ky'a kra kr'a kwa kw'a kla kl'a kham kha: zhes pa ni las kyi dbang po dang las kyi dbang po'i bya ba bcu gnyis so //
analyzed: kha kh'a kya ky'a kra kr'a kwa kw'a kla kl'a kham kha: zhes pa ni las kyi dbang po dang las kyi dbang po'i bya ba bcu gnyis so //
translated: Kha, k'a, ka, k'a, kra, k'ra, kva, k'va, k'la, k'la, kham, k'aḥ, are the twelve acts of the organ of action and of the acts.

original: de bzhin du ka k'a ke kee kar k'a ra ko koo ka la k'a la kam ka: zhes pa ni skye mched bcu gnyis grub pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du ka k'a ke kee kar k'a ra ko koo ka la k'a la kam ka: zhes pa ni skye mched bcu gnyis grub pa'o //
translated: In the same way, ka, ka, ke, k'e, kar, k'ar, ko, k'o, ka, k'a, ka, k'a, kam, k'aḥ, are the twelve sense-fields.

original: khams 'di rnams kyi gtso bo ni thabs stong pa chen po 'gyur med lnga dang shes rab thig le stong pa 'gyur med drug ste /
analyzed: khams 'di rnams kyi gtso bo ni thabs stong pa chen po 'gyur med lnga dang shes rab thig le stong pa 'gyur med drug ste /
translated: The principal ones among these elements are the five methods, the unchanging great void, and the six unchanging voids, the wisdoms.

original: wam yig dang ae yig go //
analyzed: wam yig dang ae yig go //
translated: They are the letters vaṃ and ai.

original: ae wam gyi yi ge ni gtso bo bde ba chen po ste dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'o //
analyzed: ae wam gyi yi ge ni gtso bo bde ba chen po ste dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'o //
translated: The letters evaṃ are the principal ones, the great bliss, the lord of the mandala.

original: ka rdo rje'i rgyud la ji lta ba de bzhin du kha rdo rje la sogs pa la grub po //
analyzed: ka rdo rje'i rgyud la ji lta ba de bzhin du kha rdo rje la sogs pa la grub po //
translated: Just as in the Vajra-tantra, so also in the Khadga-tantra, etc.

original: de ltar snying po'i 'phar ma la phung po dang khams rnams so //
analyzed: de ltar snying po'i 'phar ma la phung po dang khams rnams so //
translated: Thus, in the pericarp, the aggregates and the elements.

original: phyi'i 'phar ma la skye mched bcu gnyis dang sgro skyong rnams dang las kyi dbang po yul dang bcas pa rnams so //
analyzed: phyi'i 'phar ma la skye mched bcu gnyis dang sgro skyong rnams dang las kyi dbang po yul dang bcas pa rnams so //
translated: The external additions are the twelve sense-spheres and the sense-fields, and the organs of action together with their objects.

original: 'dir gzhon nu lo bcu drug gi rjes la bu dang bu mo'i phung po rnams skyed par byed pa nyid kyi phyir dbang phyug mtha' yas 'khor lo can zhes pa ji lta ba de bzhin gshegs pa lnga la sogs pa'i bkod pa spro ba'i phyir lha'i tshogs kyi🔽gtso bo ni dbang phyug mtha' yas 'khor lo can du 'gyur ro zhes pa nges pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir gzhon nu lo bcu drug gi rjes la bu dang bu mo'i phung po rnams skyed par byed pa nyid kyi phyir dbang phyug mtha' yas 'khor lo can zhes pa ji lta ba de bzhin gshegs pa lnga la sogs pa'i bkod pa spro ba'i phyir lha'i tshogs kyi gtso bo ni dbang phyug mtha' yas 'khor lo can du 'gyur ro zhes pa nges pa'o //
translated: Here, just as the sixteen-year-old youth is the lord of the creation of the aggregates of sons and daughters, so the chief of the hosts of gods is the lord of the creation of the five Tathagatas and so forth, in order to expand the array.🔽This is the determination that the lord of the creation is the lord of the creation of the five Tathagatas and so forth.

original: 'dir mngal gyi lus skyed pa ji lta ba de bzhin du lha skyed pa la dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang bsnyen pa'i yan lag go //
analyzed: 'dir mngal gyi lus skyed pa ji lta ba de bzhin du lha skyed pa la dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang bsnyen pa'i yan lag go //
translated: Here, just as the creation of the womb-born body, so the creation of the gods is the supreme mandala and the branch of service.

original: ngag skyed pa ji lta ba de bzhin du las rgyal mchog dang nye ba'i sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: ngag skyed pa ji lta ba de bzhin du las rgyal mchog dang nye ba'i sgrub pa'o //
translated: Just as the creation of speech, so the creation of the action is the supreme karmamudra and the near attainment.

original: byang chub @190a * //
analyzed: byang chub @190a * //
translated: Enlightenment

original: sems kyi thig le skyed pa ji lta ba de bzhin du thig le'i rnal 'byor dang sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: sems kyi thig le skyed pa ji lta ba de bzhin du thig le'i rnal 'byor dang sgrub pa'o //
translated: Just as the bindu of the mind is generated, so too is the yoga and the practice of the bindus.

original: khu ba 'pho ba na bde bskyed pa ji lta ba de bzhin du phra mo'i rnal 'byor dang sgrub pa chen po ste de ltar yan lag bzhi'i sgrub pa nang gi le'u las sngar gsungs pa de rgya cher sbyang bar bya'o /
analyzed: khu ba 'pho ba na bde bskyed pa ji lta ba de bzhin du phra mo'i rnal 'byor dang sgrub pa chen po ste de ltar yan lag bzhi'i sgrub pa nang gi le'u las sngar gsungs pa de rgya cher sbyang bar bya'o /
translated: Just as the generation of bliss is from the emission of the seminal fluid, so too is the yoga of the subtle and the great practice. Thus, the practice of the four branches that was previously taught in the chapter on the inner should be extensively applied.

original: zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
translated: This is the definitive meaning.🔽Now, the emanation of the deities of the families from the six elements in the six cakras is explained.

original: da ni 'khor lo drug po rnams su khams drug las rigs kyi lha rnams spro ba gsungs pa dag par zhes pa la sogs pa ste 'dir mi rnams kyi lo bcu drug gi rjes la khams drug gi rang bzhin gyi sems kyis sna tshogs pa spro bar byed
analyzed: da ni 'khor lo drug po rnams su khams drug las rigs kyi lha rnams spro ba gsungs pa dag par zhes pa la sogs pa ste 'dir mi rnams kyi lo bcu drug gi rjes la khams drug gi rang bzhin gyi sems kyis sna tshogs pa spro bar byed
translated: In this case, after sixteen human years, the mind, which is the nature of the six elements, emanates the diversity.

original: pa ji lta bde bzhin du gtso bo'i yang khams drug gi dbye ba'o //
analyzed: pa ji lta bde bzhin du gtso bo'i yang khams drug gi dbye ba'o //
translated: Just as that is, so too is the division of the principal’s six elements.

original: dag par zhes pa dpral ba'i 'khor lor yang dag dag pa'i chu las zhes pa sgrib pa med pa chu'i khams dang / 'du shes kyi phung po las lha'i tshogs ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar padma'i mtshan ma can spro ba ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: dag par zhes pa dpral ba'i 'khor lor yang dag dag pa'i chu las zhes pa sgrib pa med pa chu'i khams dang / 'du shes kyi phung po las lha'i tshogs ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar padma'i mtshan ma can spro ba ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The pure is also the wheel of the forehead. From the water of purity is the water element without obscuration. From the aggregate of discrimination is the emanation of the assembly of deities, white like the moon, marked with lotuses.

original: 'od dpag med dang m'a ma k'i dang padma mthar byed dang mi g-yo ba dang nga rgyal ma dang tsun d'a dang 'jig rten dbang phyug dang gzugs rdo rje ma dang drag mo dang dpal mo dang rgya mtsho dang tshogs kyi dbang po dang klu mtha' yas dang
analyzed: 'od dpag med dang m'a ma k'i dang padma mthar byed dang mi g-yo ba dang nga rgyal ma dang tsun d'a dang 'jig rten dbang phyug dang gzugs rdo rje ma dang drag mo dang dpal mo dang rgya mtsho dang tshogs kyi dbang po dang klu mtha' yas dang
translated: This is as follows: Amitābha, Māmakī, Padmanarteśvara, Acala, Īrṣyādevī, Cundā, Lokeśvara, Rūpavajrā, Caṇḍī, Śrīmatī, Sāgara, Gaṇapati, Ananta,

original: rigs ldan dang stag gdong ma dang 'ug gdong ma ste /
analyzed: rigs ldan dang stag gdong ma dang 'ug gdong ma ste /
translated: Nāgarāja, Vyāghraमुखी, and Ulūkमुखी.

original: de ltar lha 'di rnams g-yon gyi zhal nas zhes pa sku'i zhal dkar po nas mchog gi snying rje yis ni spros pa'o zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar lha 'di rnams g-yon gyi zhal nas zhes pa sku'i zhal dkar po nas mchog gi snying rje yis ni spros pa'o zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo'i nges pa'o //
translated: Thus, these deities are from the left face, that is, from the white face of the body, emanated by supreme compassion, which is the determination of Bhagavān Kālacakra.

original: 'dir snang ba mtha' yas la rnam par shes pa dang lha'i tshogs la snang ba mtha' yas kyis rgyas btab pa padma'i mtshan ma can zhi ba dang rgyas pa'i las kyi dngos grub ster ba chu'i kha dog las dkar po ste de ltar snang ba mtha' yas kyi
analyzed: 'dir snang ba mtha' yas la rnam par shes pa dang lha'i tshogs la snang ba mtha' yas kyis rgyas btab pa padma'i mtshan ma can zhi ba dang rgyas pa'i las kyi dngos grub ster ba chu'i kha dog las dkar po ste de ltar snang ba mtha' yas kyi
translated: Here, the infinite light is the seal of consciousness and the assembly of deities, and the one with the sign of a lotus grants the spiritual powers of the activities of pacifying and increasing, and the color of the water is white.

original: rigs kyi lha spro ba dang bsdu ba ni so sor rtog pa las so //🔽da ni don yod grub pa'i rigs spro ba gsungs pa chos la zhes pa la sogs pa ste 'dir snying ga chos kyi 'khor lor yang dag dag pa'i rlung gi khams dang dag /
analyzed: rigs kyi lha spro ba dang bsdu ba ni so sor rtog pa las so // da ni don yod grub pa'i rigs spro ba gsungs pa chos la zhes pa la sogs pa ste 'dir snying ga chos kyi 'khor lor yang dag dag pa'i rlung gi khams dang dag /
translated: Thus, the emanation and gathering of the deities of the family of infinite light is from discrimination.

original: pa'i 'du byed las ral gri'i mtshan ma can lha'i tshogs kha dog nag po ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: pa'i 'du byed las ral gri'i mtshan ma can lha'i tshogs kha dog nag po ni 'di lta ste /
translated: Now, the emanation of the family of Amoghasiddhi is stated: “Dharma” and so on. Here, in the navel chakra of phenomena, from the pure wind element and the pure formation, the one with the sign of a sword, the assembly of deities, the color black, is as follows:

original: don yod grub pa dang sgrol ma dang bgegs mthar byed dang dbyug sngon can dang shin tu stobs ma dang rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang nam mkha'i snying po dang reg bya rdo rje ma dang tsa tsi k'a dang khyab 'jug ma dang rlung lha @190b dang bden
analyzed: don yod grub pa dang sgrol ma dang bgegs mthar byed dang dbyug sngon can dang shin tu stobs ma dang rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang nam mkha'i snying po dang reg bya rdo rje ma dang tsa tsi k'a dang khyab 'jug ma dang rlung lha @190b dang bden
translated: Amoghasiddhi, Tārā, Vighnāntakṛt, Nīladaṇḍa, Mahābalā, Vajrāṅkuśī, Ākāśagarbha, Sparśavajrā, Cācī, Viṣṇu, Vāyu,

original: bral dang padma dang stobs kyi rgyu dang bya rog gdong ma dang khyi gdang ma ste 'di rnams ni byams pa'i thugs kyi srid pa gsum gyi bdag pos shar gyi zhal nas zhes pa thugs kyi zhal nas spros pa'o //
analyzed: bral dang padma dang stobs kyi rgyu dang bya rog gdong ma dang khyi gdang ma ste 'di rnams ni byams pa'i thugs kyi srid pa gsum gyi bdag pos shar gyi zhal nas zhes pa thugs kyi zhal nas spros pa'o //
translated: Rudra, Padma, Hayagrīva, Kākāsyā, Śvānadāsā—these are the emanations from the mind of Maitreya, the lord of the three existences, from the eastern face, the face of mind.

original: 'dir don yod grub pa la rnam par shes pa dang lha'i tshogs la don yod grub pas rgyas btab pa ral gri'i mtshan ma can bskrad pa dang dbye ba'i las kyi dngos grub bdag rlung gi kha dog las nag po ste de ltar don yod grub pa'i rigs
analyzed: 'dir don yod grub pa la rnam par shes pa dang lha'i tshogs la don yod grub pas rgyas btab pa ral gri'i mtshan ma can bskrad pa dang dbye ba'i las kyi dngos grub bdag rlung gi kha dog las nag po ste de ltar don yod grub pa'i rigs
translated: Here, the consciousness of Amoghasiddhi and the assembly of deities are sealed by Amoghasiddhi, the one with the sign of a sword. The siddhi of the activities of expelling and dividing is black from the color of the vāyu.🔽Thus, the family of Amoghasiddhi is black.

original: kyi lha rnams spro ba dang bsdu ba ni bya ba nan gtan las so //
analyzed: kyi lha rnams spro ba dang bsdu ba ni bya ba nan gtan las so //
translated: The emanation and withdrawal of the deities of Ratnasaṃbhava is from the definite activity.

original: da ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rigs spro ba gsungs pa longs spyod rdzogs par dag pa'i me las zhes pa ste 'dir mgrin pa'i 'khor lor dag pa'i me dang dag pa'i tshor ba las nyi ma 'char ka dang mtshungs zhes pa kha dog dmar po ste rin
analyzed: da ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rigs spro ba gsungs pa longs spyod rdzogs par dag pa'i me las zhes pa ste 'dir mgrin pa'i 'khor lor dag pa'i me dang dag pa'i tshor ba las nyi ma 'char ka dang mtshungs zhes pa kha dog dmar po ste rin
translated: Now, the emanation of the Ratnasaṃbhava family is stated: From the fire of the pure enjoyment… Here, “from the fire of the pure enjoyment at the throat cakra and the pure feeling” is the “red” color, like the rising sun, of Ratnasaṃbhava.🔽Ratnadhṛk is Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: chen 'dzin zhes pa rin chen 'byung ldan dang de bzhin du gos dkar mo dang shes rab mthar byed dang 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang rmugs byed ma dang khro gnyer can dang sa'i snying po dang ro'i rdo rje ma dang phag mo dang gzhon nu ma dang me
analyzed: chen 'dzin zhes pa rin chen 'byung ldan dang de bzhin du gos dkar mo dang shes rab mthar byed dang 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang rmugs byed ma dang khro gnyer can dang sa'i snying po dang ro'i rdo rje ma dang phag mo dang gzhon nu ma dang me
translated: Similarly, Pāṇḍaravāsinī, Prajñāntaka, Kāmarāja, Saṃtrāsī, Bhīma, Kṣitigarbha, Mahāroṣaṇa, Vārāhī, Kumārī, and Meghaśrī are the retinue of Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: lha dang smin drug gi bu dang phag gdong ma dang bya rgod gdong ma dang nor rgyas kyi bu dang dung skyong ste 'di rnams dpal ldan g-yas kyi zhal nas mchog gi dga' ba yi ni sna tshogs gtso bos spros pa'o zhes pa gsung gi zhal gyi rang
analyzed: lha dang smin drug gi bu dang phag gdong ma dang bya rgod gdong ma dang nor rgyas kyi bu dang dung skyong ste 'di rnams dpal ldan g-yas kyi zhal nas mchog gi dga' ba yi ni sna tshogs gtso bos spros pa'o zhes pa gsung gi zhal gyi rang
translated: The gods, Skanda, Varāhaमुख, Gṛdhrakokमुख, Vāmana, and Śankhapāla, are emanated by the chief of the various supreme joys from the glorious right face.

original: bzhin las thams cad kha dog dmar po rin chen 'byung ldan gyis rgyas btab pa dbang dang dgug pa'i dngos grub ster ba'o //
analyzed: bzhin las thams cad kha dog dmar po rin chen 'byung ldan gyis rgyas btab pa dbang dang dgug pa'i dngos grub ster ba'o //
translated: Thus, from the nature of the face of speech, all of them are red in color, sealed by Ratnasaṃbhava, and grant the powers of control and attraction.

original: de ltar rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rigs kyi lha rnams spro ba la sogs pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes las te 'dir yang rin chen 'byung ldan ni rnam par shes pas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rigs kyi lha rnams spro ba la sogs pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes las te 'dir yang rin chen 'byung ldan ni rnam par shes pas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: Thus, the emanation of the deities of the Ratnasaṃbhava family and so on arise from the gnosis of equality. Here, Ratnasaṃbhava is sealed by consciousness.

original: da ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs kyi lha spro ba gsungs pa lte bar yang dag dag pa'i sa las zhes pa la sogs pa ste 'dir lte bar zhes pa sprul pa'i 'khor lor dag pa'i gzugs kyi phung po dang dag pa'i sa'i khams las mchog gi🔽gser dang mtshungs pa kha dog ser po'i thub pa phyag na 'khor lo zhes pa rnam par snang mdzad de de bzhin du spyan ma dang gshin rje mthar byed dang stobs po che dang rengs byed ma dang 'od zer can dang rnam par sel ba dang dri rdo
analyzed: da ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs kyi lha spro ba gsungs pa lte bar yang dag dag pa'i sa las zhes pa la sogs pa ste 'dir lte bar zhes pa sprul pa'i 'khor lor dag pa'i gzugs kyi phung po dang dag pa'i sa'i khams las mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa kha dog ser po'i thub pa phyag na 'khor lo zhes pa rnam par snang mdzad de de bzhin du spyan ma dang gshin rje mthar byed dang stobs po che dang rengs byed ma dang 'od zer can dang rnam par sel ba dang dri rdo
translated: Here, “at the navel” means that from the pure form aggregate and the pure earth element in the emanation wheel, the supreme🔽Vairocana, who is like pure gold, is yellow, and holds a wheel in his hand.🔽Similarly, Locanā, Yamantaka, Mahābala, Stambhana, Māmakī, Nivāraṇaviṣkambhin, Gandhavajrā, Vighnantakṛt, Brahmā, Indra, and Varuṇa

original: rje ma dang dbang mo dang tshangs ma dang brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jog po @191a * //
analyzed: rje ma dang dbang mo dang tshangs ma dang brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jog po @191a * //
translated: are generated from the pure water element and the moon in the emanation wheel.

original: dang padma chen po dang lce sbyang gdong ma dang mkha' lding gdong ma ste 'di rnams gtso bo yis ni btang snyoms dag gis nub kyi zhal nas zhes pa ye shes kyi zhal nas skye bo kun la phan rnams spros pa ste /
analyzed: dang padma chen po dang lce sbyang gdong ma dang mkha' lding gdong ma ste 'di rnams gtso bo yis ni btang snyoms dag gis nub kyi zhal nas zhes pa ye shes kyi zhal nas skye bo kun la phan rnams spros pa ste /
translated: Mahāpadma, Jālinīprabha, and Garuḍavaktrā—these are emanated from the face in the west of the principal one, who is impartial, from the face of gnosis, for the benefit of all beings.

original: kha dog ser po rengs ba dang rmongs pa la sogs pa'i las kyi dngos grub ster ba rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyas btab cing /
analyzed: kha dog ser po rengs ba dang rmongs pa la sogs pa'i las kyi dngos grub ster ba rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyas btab cing /
translated: Yellow in color, they bestow the powers of the actions of paralyzing, deluding, and so on, and are sealed by Vairocana.

original: rnam par snang mdzad la yang rnam par shes pas rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la yang rnam par shes pas rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: And Vairocana is sealed by consciousness.

original: de ltar rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs spro ba la sogs pa ni me long lta bu'i ye shes las so //
analyzed: de ltar rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs spro ba la sogs pa ni me long lta bu'i ye shes las so //
translated: Thus, the emanation of the Vairocana family and so on is from mirror-like gnosis.

original: da ni mi bskyod pa'i rigs spro ba gsungs pa gtsug tor dag pa'i stong pa las ni zhes pa ste /
analyzed: da ni mi bskyod pa'i rigs spro ba gsungs pa gtsug tor dag pa'i stong pa las ni zhes pa ste /
translated: Now, the emanation of the Akṣobhya family is stated: From the empty purity of the uṣṇīṣa.

original: gtsug tor gyi 'khor lor dag pa'i rnam par shes pa'i phung po dang dag pa'i nam mkha'i khams las mchog gi rdo rje 'dzin pa mi bskyod pa ye shes kyis rgyas btab pa /
analyzed: gtsug tor gyi 'khor lor dag pa'i rnam par shes pa'i phung po dang dag pa'i nam mkha'i khams las mchog gi rdo rje 'dzin pa mi bskyod pa ye shes kyis rgyas btab pa /
translated: In the crown chakra, from the pure aggregate of consciousness and the pure space element, is supreme Vajra Holder Akṣobhya, sealed by exalted wisdom.

original: kha dog ljang gu dang / de bzhin du rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma dang gtsug tor dang rdo rje h'um mdzad dang drag spyan ma dang khro mo'i rgyal mo dang phyag na rdo rje dang chos kyi khams kyi rdo rje ma dang khyab 'jug dang gshin rje dang klu rgyal ba ste
analyzed: kha dog ljang gu dang / de bzhin du rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma dang gtsug tor dang rdo rje h'um mdzad dang drag spyan ma dang khro mo'i rgyal mo dang phyag na rdo rje dang chos kyi khams kyi rdo rje ma dang khyab 'jug dang gshin rje dang klu rgyal ba ste
translated: He is green in color. Likewise, Vajradhātvīśvarī, Uṣṇīṣa, Vajra-Hūṃkāra, Caṇḍākṣī, Queen of Wrath, Vajrapāṇi, Vajra of the Element of Phenomena, Viṣṇu, Yama, and the nāga king Vāsuki

original: 'di rnams steng gi zhal nas stong pa las spros pa yon tan mang po'i gnas te /
analyzed: 'di rnams steng gi zhal nas stong pa las spros pa yon tan mang po'i gnas te /
translated: are emanated from the empty faces above. They are the source of many qualities.

original: las thams cad kyi dngos grub ster ba rdo rje'i mtshan ma can mi bskyod pas rgyas btab pa nam mkha'i kha dog las ljang gu'o //
analyzed: las thams cad kyi dngos grub ster ba rdo rje'i mtshan ma can mi bskyod pas rgyas btab pa nam mkha'i kha dog las ljang gu'o //
translated: They grant spiritual powers for all activities. They are marked with vajras, sealed by Akṣobhya, and green in color, the color of space.

original: de ltar mi bskyod pa'i rigs kyi lha spro ba la sogs pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes las so //
analyzed: de ltar mi bskyod pa'i rigs kyi lha spro ba la sogs pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes las so //
translated: Thus, the emanation of the deities of the Akṣobhya family and so on are from the gnosis of the utterly pure dharmadhātu.

original: da ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs spro ba gsungs pa gsung bar dag pa las ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: da ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs spro ba gsungs pa gsung bar dag pa las ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Now, the emanation of the Vajrasattva family is stated: “From the pure aggregate of gnosis, the pure gnosis element, and so on.”

original: 'dir gsang ba'i 'khor lor dag pa'i ye shes kyi phung po dang dag pa'i ye shes kyi khams las rdo rje sems dpa' sngon po rdo rje rtse gsum ba'i mtshan ma can rnam par shes pas rgyas btab pa dang / de bzhin du ye shes kyi khams shes rab sngon mo dang gnod mdzes rgyal po dang rdo rje shugs dang /
analyzed: 'dir gsang ba'i 'khor lor dag pa'i ye shes kyi phung po dang dag pa'i ye shes kyi khams las rdo rje sems dpa' sngon po rdo rje rtse gsum ba'i mtshan ma can rnam par shes pas rgyas btab pa dang / de bzhin du ye shes kyi khams shes rab sngon mo dang gnod mdzes rgyal po dang rdo rje shugs dang /
translated: Here, from the pure aggregate of gnosis and the pure gnosis element in the secret cakra, blue Vajrasattva, marked with a three-pronged vajra, is sealed with consciousness.

original: shin tu sngon mo dang khro bo'i dbang phyug ma dang drag po dang dzam bha la dang / kun du bzang po dang sgra rdo rje ma dang / klu rnam par rgyal ba ste skye bo kun la phan pa 'di rnams ni srog chags rnams kyi thar pa'i rgyur ni 'og gi zhal ye shes kyi chos las spros pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes las @191b kha dog sngon po
analyzed: shin tu sngon mo dang khro bo'i dbang phyug ma dang drag po dang dzam bha la dang / kun du bzang po dang sgra rdo rje ma dang / klu rnam par rgyal ba ste skye bo kun la phan pa 'di rnams ni srog chags rnams kyi thar pa'i rgyur ni 'og gi zhal ye shes kyi chos las spros pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes las @191b kha dog sngon po
translated: The very blue, the goddess of wrath, Rudra, Jambhala, Samantabhadra, Shabdavajrā, and the nāga Jayoṣmāyatana—these benefactors of all beings are sealed by Vajrasattva, who has the appearance of the blue Akṣhobhya, with a blue complexion,

original: ste mi bskyod pa sngon po'i cha byad can gyi rdo rje sems dpas rgyas btab pa ni las thams cad sgrub bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: ste mi bskyod pa sngon po'i cha byad can gyi rdo rje sems dpas rgyas btab pa ni las thams cad sgrub bar byed pa'o //
translated: in order to accomplish all activities, from the wisdom of the dharmadhātu, which is the very pure Dharma that is emanated from the Dharma of wisdom, the lower face.

original: de ltar 'khor lo drug tu rigs drug gi lha rnams spro ba dang 'gro ba'i don byed pa ste lo bcu drug gi rjes la dus kyi 'khor lo skyed par byed pa nyid kyis grub pa'o zhes pa nges pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar 'khor lo drug tu rigs drug gi lha rnams spro ba dang 'gro ba'i don byed pa ste lo bcu drug gi rjes la dus kyi 'khor lo skyed par byed pa nyid kyis grub pa'o zhes pa nges pa'o //
translated: Thus, the emanation and activity for the benefit of migrating beings of the deities of the six families in the six cakras, after sixteen years, is the accomplishment of the generation of Kālachakra, which is the ascertainment.

original: 'dir rnam par shes pa'i phung po mi bskyod pa ljang gu la mi bskyod pa'i gzugs sngon po dang ye shes kyi phung po sngon bo la mi bskyod pa ljang gus rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir rnam par shes pa'i phung po mi bskyod pa ljang gu la mi bskyod pa'i gzugs sngon po dang ye shes kyi phung po sngon bo la mi bskyod pa ljang gus rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: Here, the green aggregate of consciousness is sealed by the blue Akṣobhya, and the blue aggregate of gnosis is sealed by the green Akṣobhya.

original: yang na sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes kyi rigs bzhi'i dbye bas gang du rgyas gdab pa der zla ba'i chos las rnam par snang mdzad dkar po dang nyi ma'i chos las snang ba mtha' yas dmar bo dang / sgra gcan gyi chos las mi bskyod pa nag po dang /
analyzed: yang na sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes kyi rigs bzhi'i dbye bas gang du rgyas gdab pa der zla ba'i chos las rnam par snang mdzad dkar po dang nyi ma'i chos las snang ba mtha' yas dmar bo dang / sgra gcan gyi chos las mi bskyod pa nag po dang /
translated: Alternatively, the white Vairocana is sealed by the moon-like nature of the body, the red Amitābha by the sun-like nature of speech, the black Akṣobhya by the Rāhu-like nature of mind,

original: dus me'i chos las rdo rje sems dpa' ser po'o //
analyzed: dus me'i chos las rdo rje sems dpa' ser po'o //
translated: and the yellow Vajrasattva by the Kālāgni-like nature of gnosis.

original: yang na sgrub thabs kyi le'u las gsungs ba'i tshogs rten dang brten pa'i 'brel bas rgyas btab ste /🔽de ltar na mi bskyod pas rnam par snang mdzad la rgyas gdab bo //
analyzed: yang na sgrub thabs kyi le'u las gsungs ba'i tshogs rten dang brten pa'i 'brel bas rgyas btab ste / de ltar na mi bskyod pas rnam par snang mdzad la rgyas gdab bo //
translated: Alternatively, the seal is made by the relationship between the support and the supported, as taught in the Sādhana section.🔽In this way, Akṣobhya seals Vairocana,

original: rnam par snang mdzad kyis snang ba mtha' yas la'o //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad kyis snang ba mtha' yas la'o //
translated: and Vairocana seals Amitābha.

original: snang ba mtha' yas kyis rin chen 'byung ldan la'o //
analyzed: snang ba mtha' yas kyis rin chen 'byung ldan la'o //
translated: Amitābha to Ratnasaṃbhava,

original: rin chen 'byung ldan gyis don yod grub pa la'o zhes pa rgyas gdab pa'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: rin chen 'byung ldan gyis don yod grub pa la'o zhes pa rgyas gdab pa'i nges pa'o //
translated: and Ratnasaṃbhava to Amoghasiddhi.

original: de ltar khams gsum pa'i dbang phyug chen po mtha' yas 'khor lo can ni rgyud gzhan thams cad la rig par bya ste /
analyzed: de ltar khams gsum pa'i dbang phyug chen po mtha' yas 'khor lo can ni rgyud gzhan thams cad la rig par bya ste /
translated: Thus, the infinite great lord of the three worlds, Cakrin, should be known in all the other tantras,

original: rigs gsum dang rigs lnga la yang ngo //
analyzed: rigs gsum dang rigs lnga la yang ngo //
translated: in the three families and the five families.

original: da ni shes rab kyi rgyud spro ba gsungs pa phyogs kyi 'dab mar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: da ni shes rab kyi rgyud spro ba gsungs pa phyogs kyi 'dab mar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Now, the emanation of the wisdom tantra is stated beginning with “on the petals of the directions,” and so on.

original: 'dir rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhi ni spyan ma la sogs pa dang sa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin zhi ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub ster par 'khor lo sngom pa las grags mod kyi /
analyzed: 'dir rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhi ni spyan ma la sogs pa dang sa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin zhi ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub ster par 'khor lo sngom pa las grags mod kyi /
translated: Here, the four, Vajraḍāka and so on, are declared in the Cakrasaṃvara Tantra to grant the powers of peace and so on, which are the natures of Locanā and so on and of earth and so on.

original: de rnams kyang bden par sa la sogs pa'i las kyi dngos grub ster bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de rnams kyang bden par sa la sogs pa'i las kyi dngos grub ster bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: However, those do not grant the powers of the actions of earth and so on truly,

original: thugs kyi zhal la sogs pa kha dog nag po la sogs pa'i dbye bas so //
analyzed: thugs kyi zhal la sogs pa kha dog nag po la sogs pa'i dbye bas so //
translated: because of the division of the black and so on colors of the face of the mind and so on.

original: de skad du gsungs ba /
analyzed: de skad du gsungs ba /
translated: It is said:🔽By the yellow one, the action of immobilizing;

original: ser pos rengs pa'i bya ba dang // dkar pos sa la zhi ba'o //
analyzed: ser pos rengs pa'i bya ba dang // dkar pos sa la zhi ba'o //
translated: By the white one, pacifying on the earth.

original: dmar pos dbang dang dgug pa ste //
analyzed: dmar pos dbang dang dgug pa ste //
translated: By the red one, controlling and summoning;

original: nag pos bskrad pa la sogs so //
analyzed: nag pos bskrad pa la sogs so //
translated: By the black one, expelling and so forth.

original: zhes so // de'i phyir kha dog nag po'i dbang gis rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ni rlung gi khams dang kha dog @192a * //
analyzed: zhes so // de'i phyir kha dog nag po'i dbang gis rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ni rlung gi khams dang kha dog @192a * //
translated: Therefore, by the power of the black color, Vajra dakini is the wind element.

original: dmar bo las l'a m'a ni me'i khams dang / kha dog ser po las dum skyes ma ni sa'i khams dang zhal gyi kha dog dkar po las gzugs can ma ni chu'i khams so //
analyzed: dmar bo las l'a m'a ni me'i khams dang / kha dog ser po las dum skyes ma ni sa'i khams dang zhal gyi kha dog dkar po las gzugs can ma ni chu'i khams so //
translated: By the red color, Lāma is the fire element. By the yellow color, Khaṇḍarohā is the earth element. By the white color of the face, Rūpiṇī is the water element.

original: de ltar thugs dang gsung dang ye shes dang sku'i zhal rnams rim pa bzhin du nag po dang / dmar po dang / ser po dang / dkar po'i kha dog yin pa ji lta ba de bzhin du de'i phyogs kyi char gnas pa /
analyzed: de ltar thugs dang gsung dang ye shes dang sku'i zhal rnams rim pa bzhin du nag po dang / dmar po dang / ser po dang / dkar po'i kha dog yin pa ji lta ba de bzhin du de'i phyogs kyi char gnas pa /
translated: Thus, the faces of mind, speech, gnosis, and body are, respectively, black, red, yellow, and white in color.

original: rab gtum mo la sogs pa lha mo dgu dgu po rnams kyi kha dog kyang rig par bya ste mngon brjod 'bum pa chen po las so zhes pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o //
analyzed: rab gtum mo la sogs pa lha mo dgu dgu po rnams kyi kha dog kyang rig par bya ste mngon brjod 'bum pa chen po las so zhes pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o //
translated: The colors of the nine goddesses such as Prachaṇḍā are to be known from the Great Hundred Thousand [Verse] Tantra of Utter Mystery.

original: de na brtson 'grus chung ba dang ldan pa rnams la 'jam dpal gyis dus kyi 'khor lo ba sdus pa /
analyzed: de na brtson 'grus chung ba dang ldan pa rnams la 'jam dpal gyis dus kyi 'khor lo ba sdus pa /
translated: There, for those endowed with little diligence, Mañjuśrī is the concise Kālacakra.

original: 'dir de nyid man ngag gis spros nas rab tu bstan no //
analyzed: 'dir de nyid man ngag gis spros nas rab tu bstan no //
translated: Here, he is taught in detail by the instructions of reality.

original: phyogs kyi 'dab mar spyan ma la sogs zhes pa ni /
analyzed: phyogs kyi 'dab mar spyan ma la sogs zhes pa ni /
translated: On the petals in the directions, Locanā and so forth.

original: nub kyi 'dab mar spyan ma'i kha dog las dum skyes ma ser mo'o //
analyzed: nub kyi 'dab mar spyan ma'i kha dog las dum skyes ma ser mo'o //
translated: On the western petal, from the color of Locanā, Khaṇḍarohā is yellow.

original: dus kyi 'khor lo he ru ka'i ye shes kyi zhal nub ma ser po ste sa'i kha dog dang bshang ba'i rtsa'i rang bzhin las so //
analyzed: dus kyi 'khor lo he ru ka'i ye shes kyi zhal nub ma ser po ste sa'i kha dog dang bshang ba'i rtsa'i rang bzhin las so //
translated: The yellow face of the knowledge of the Heruka Kālacakra in the west is the color of earth and the nature of the anus channel.

original: byang gi 'dab mar chu'i kha dog las gzugs can ma dkar mo dang / byang gi sku'i zhal dkar po ste la la n'a'i rang bzhin las so //
analyzed: byang gi 'dab mar chu'i kha dog las gzugs can ma dkar mo dang / byang gi sku'i zhal dkar po ste la la n'a'i rang bzhin las so //
translated: On the northern petal, from the color of water, Rūpiṇī is white, and the northern body face is white, the nature of the lalana.

original: lhor me'i kha dog las l'a m'a dmar mo dang / gsung gi zhal dmar po ste ra sa n'a'i rang bzhin las so //🔽shar gyi 'dab mar rlung gi kha dog las rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma nag mo dang / thugs kyi zhal nag po ste /
analyzed: lhor me'i kha dog las l'a m'a dmar mo dang / gsung gi zhal dmar po ste ra sa n'a'i rang bzhin las so // shar gyi 'dab mar rlung gi kha dog las rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma nag mo dang / thugs kyi zhal nag po ste /
translated: In the south, from the color of fire, red Lāma, and the red face of speech, from the nature of Rasanā.

original: gci ba'i rtsa'i rang bzhin las so //
analyzed: gci ba'i rtsa'i rang bzhin las so //
translated: On the eastern petal, from the color of wind, black Vajraḍāka, and the black face of mind, from the nature of the feces nāḍī.

original: de bzhin du aa ba dh'u t'i'i rang bzhin gyis rdo rje phag mo ljang gu'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du aa ba dh'u t'i'i rang bzhin gyis rdo rje phag mo ljang gu'o //
translated: In the same way, from the nature of the avadhūti, green Vajravārāhī.

original: dung can ma'i rang bzhin las bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo he ru ka kha dog sngon po'o //
analyzed: dung can ma'i rang bzhin las bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo he ru ka kha dog sngon po'o //
translated: From the nature of the conch, the bhagavān Kālacakra Heruka is blue.

original: de bzhin du thugs dang gsung dang sku'i 'khor lo'i rtsibs rnams la shar dang mer mkha' 'gro ma nag po rnams dang lho dang bden bral du dmar mo rnams dang / nub dang rlung du ser mo rnams dang / byang dang dbang ldan du dkar mo rnams te /
analyzed: de bzhin du thugs dang gsung dang sku'i 'khor lo'i rtsibs rnams la shar dang mer mkha' 'gro ma nag po rnams dang lho dang bden bral du dmar mo rnams dang / nub dang rlung du ser mo rnams dang / byang dang dbang ldan du dkar mo rnams te /
translated: In the same way, on the spokes of the mind, speech, and body cakras, in the east and south, the black ḍākinīs, in the south and southwest, the red ones, in the west and northwest, the yellow ones, and in the north and northeast, the white ones.

original: de bzhin du dur khrod brgyad kyi lha mo rnams rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du dur khrod brgyad kyi lha mo rnams rig par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, the goddesses of the eight charnel grounds should be known.

original: 'di rnams kyi las rab 'byam la sogs pa rgya cher rgyud las gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi las rab 'byam la sogs pa rgya cher rgyud las gsungs pa ni /
translated: The extensive teachings on the various activities of these [deities] and so forth are found in the tantra.

original: byag na rdo rjes mdzad pa'i rgyas 'grel stong phrag drug cu pa las @192b rtags par bya ste /
analyzed: byag na rdo rjes mdzad pa'i rgyas 'grel stong phrag drug cu pa las @192b rtags par bya ste /
translated: They should be known from the extensive commentary composed by Vajrapāṇi, the Sixty Thousand.

original: des na bsdus pa'i rgyud 'dir ma bris so //
analyzed: des na bsdus pa'i rgyud 'dir ma bris so //
translated: Therefore, they are not written in this condensed tantra.

original: phyogs bral 'dab ma la gnas zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: phyogs bral 'dab ma la gnas zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: The line abiding in the petals free from directions and so forth is easy to understand.

original: de bzhin du 'dus pa dang sgyu 'phrul dra ba yang rab tu grags pas go sla ste //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'dus pa dang sgyu 'phrul dra ba yang rab tu grags pas go sla ste //
translated: In the same way, the Guhyasamāja and the Māyājāla are also well known and easy to understand.

original: des na 'dir ma bris so //
analyzed: des na 'dir ma bris so //
translated: Therefore, they are not written here.

original: thugs dang gsung dang sku'i rdo rje spro ba tsam zhes pa la /
analyzed: thugs dang gsung dang sku'i rdo rje spro ba tsam zhes pa la /
translated: Regarding merely emanating the vajras of mind, speech, and body,

original: 'dir rtsa ba'i rgyud las thig gi mtshan nyid ni /
analyzed: 'dir rtsa ba'i rgyud las thig gi mtshan nyid ni /
translated: here the characteristics of the lines are taught in the root tantra:

original: gnyis dang gcig dang gsum phyed bcas //
analyzed: gnyis dang gcig dang gsum phyed bcas //
translated: two, one, and three and a half,

original: phyed dang gcig dus ri bong can //
analyzed: phyed dang gcig dus ri bong can //
translated: half, one, and the moon,

original: dus dang gcig dang dus dang gcig / cha ni sum cu gnyis sogs la //🔽zhes pa ste /
analyzed: dus dang gcig dang dus dang gcig / cha ni sum cu gnyis sogs la //🔽zhes pa ste /
translated: one time, and one, and one time, and one, the thirty-two parts, and so forth.

original: lhag ma ra ba la sogs pa ni dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bzhin no //
analyzed: lhag ma ra ba la sogs pa ni dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bzhin no //
translated: The remaining parts, such as the archways, are like the Cakrasaṃvara maṇḍala.

original: da ni sdom pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor gsungs pa thig ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: da ni sdom pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor gsungs pa thig ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Now, the maṇḍala of the Great Binding is stated: the line, etc.

original: 'dir nub kyi zhal ye shes kyi zhal nas 'khor lo sdom pa chen po ni 'khor lo gsum gyi sdom pa nyis 'gyur te ;
analyzed: 'dir nub kyi zhal ye shes kyi zhal nas 'khor lo sdom pa chen po ni 'khor lo gsum gyi sdom pa nyis 'gyur te ;
translated: Here, the great Cakrasaṃvara is the binding of the three wheels doubled, from the face of the west, the face of gnosis.

original: gang gi phyir 'khor lo drug dang dur khrod bcu drug po rnams kyis so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'khor lo drug dang dur khrod bcu drug po rnams kyis so //
translated: Because of the six wheels and the sixteen charnel grounds.

original: des na sgo brgyad rnam par sbyang ba'i slad du 'di'i dkyil 'khor ni zlum po'o //
analyzed: des na sgo brgyad rnam par sbyang ba'i slad du 'di'i dkyil 'khor ni zlum po'o //
translated: Therefore, in order to purify the eight doors, its maṇḍala is round.

original: de'i phyir dkyil 'khor 'di'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir dkyil 'khor 'di'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa /
translated: Thus, the characteristic of this maṇḍala is stated:

original: thig ni drug dang thug pa'i cha shas zhes pa ni dgu bcu rtsa drug gi cha shas so //
analyzed: thig ni drug dang thug pa'i cha shas zhes pa ni dgu bcu rtsa drug gi cha shas so //
translated: The line is the sixty-ninth part.

original: g-yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas rnams kyis zhes pa 'jig rten gyi khams la rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' dpag tshad 'bum phrag bzhir gnas pa dang / lus la khru bzhir gnas pa rnams kyis te thig dgu bcu rtsa drug rnams kyis dkyil 'khor la thig btab nas de rnams kyi dbus su drug drug cha rnams kyis so sor 'khor lo bya ste de ltar 'khor lo ni cha drug drug rnams kyis so //
analyzed: g-yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas rnams kyis zhes pa 'jig rten gyi khams la rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' dpag tshad 'bum phrag bzhir gnas pa dang / lus la khru bzhir gnas pa rnams kyis te thig dgu bcu rtsa drug rnams kyis dkyil 'khor la thig btab nas de rnams kyi dbus su drug drug cha rnams kyis so sor 'khor lo bya ste de ltar 'khor lo ni cha drug drug rnams kyis so //
translated: Having drawn the maṇḍala with the ninety-six lines, the maṇḍala is made with six parts in the center of each.🔽The lotus with a center and petals is also made with six parts on half of that.

original: padma'i 'dab ma lte bar ldan ba'i phyed la yang drug gi cha rnams kyis te de ltar bdun po rnams la shar du cha bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis so //
analyzed: padma'i 'dab ma lte bar ldan ba'i phyed la yang drug gi cha rnams kyis te de ltar bdun po rnams la shar du cha bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis so //
translated: Thus, there are thirty-two parts in the east of those seven.

original: de bzhin du nub dang lho dang byang du ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du nub dang lho dang byang du ste /
translated: Similarly, there are thirty-two in the west, south, and north.

original: thams cad gcig tu bsdus pas cha brgyad cu rtsa bzhi song ste /
analyzed: thams cad gcig tu bsdus pas cha brgyad cu rtsa bzhi song ste /
translated: Adding all of those together, there are eighty-four parts.

original: dgu bcu rtsa drug las so //
analyzed: dgu bcu rtsa drug las so //
translated: Thus, there are ninety-six.

original: lhag ma cha bcu gnyis po rnams la cha drug gis shar gyi sa'o //
analyzed: lhag ma cha bcu gnyis po rnams la cha drug gis shar gyi sa'o //
translated: The remaining twelve parts are divided into six parts each in the east.

original: nub tu yang de bzhin te byang dang lho ru yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: nub tu yang de bzhin te byang dang lho ru yang de bzhin no //
translated: The same in the west, and the same in the north and south.

original: phyogs thams cad du thig rnams dag pa'o //
analyzed: phyogs thams cad du thig rnams dag pa'o //
translated: The lines are pure in all directions.

original: de la sngar gsungs pa'i dbus kyi cha drug rnams @193a * //
analyzed: de la sngar gsungs pa'i dbus kyi cha drug rnams @193a * //
translated: Therein, the six parts in the center previously mentioned

original: kyi bzhis padma'i 'dab ma dang gnyis kyis lte ba phyed do //
analyzed: kyi bzhis padma'i 'dab ma dang gnyis kyis lte ba phyed do //
translated: are divided into four parts for the lotus petals and two parts for half the center.

original: de bzhin du bzhis 'khor lo'i rtsibs dang gnyis kyis gri gug la sogs pa rnams kyi mtshan ma'i phreng ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du bzhis 'khor lo'i rtsibs dang gnyis kyis gri gug la sogs pa rnams kyi mtshan ma'i phreng ba'o //
translated: Similarly, four parts are for the spokes of the wheel and two parts are for the garland of symbols such as the flaying knife and so forth.

original: dbus su padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa'o //
analyzed: dbus su padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa'o //
translated: In the center is a sixteen-petaled lotus.

original: padma'i 'dab ma'i phyi rol du gri gug gi phreng ba sngon po ste de'i 'og tu sa ljang khu'o //
analyzed: padma'i 'dab ma'i phyi rol du gri gug gi phreng ba sngon po ste de'i 'og tu sa ljang khu'o //
translated: Outside the lotus petals is a garland of flaying knives, which is blue. Below that is the green earth.

original: de bzhin du ye shes kyi khams kyi 'khor lo la 'khor lo'i rtsibs kyang sngon po'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du ye shes kyi khams kyi 'khor lo la 'khor lo'i rtsibs kyang sngon po'o //
translated: Similarly, in the wheel of the element of consciousness, the spokes of the wheel are also blue.

original: de nas sa'i khams kyi 'khor lo la 'khor lo'i phreng ba ser po dang de bzhin du 'khor lo'i rtsibs te /
analyzed: de nas sa'i khams kyi 'khor lo la 'khor lo'i phreng ba ser po dang de bzhin du 'khor lo'i rtsibs te /
translated: Then, in the wheel of the earth element, the wheel has a yellow garland and spokes.

original: 'og tu sa nag po'o ;
analyzed: 'og tu sa nag po'o ;
translated: Below is the black earth.

original: / chu'i khams kyi 'khor lo la padma'i phreng ba dang 'khor lo'i rtsibs dkar po ste /
analyzed: / chu'i khams kyi 'khor lo la padma'i phreng ba dang 'khor lo'i rtsibs dkar po ste /
translated: In the wheel of the water element, the lotus has a white garland and spokes.

original: 'og tu sa dmar po'o //
analyzed: 'og tu sa dmar po'o //
translated: Below is the red earth.

original: me'i khams kyi 'khor lo la rin po che'i phreng ba dang / 'khor lo'i rtsibs dmar po ste /
analyzed: me'i khams kyi 'khor lo la rin po che'i phreng ba dang / 'khor lo'i rtsibs dmar po ste /
translated: In the wheel of the fire element, the jewel has a red garland and spokes.

original: 'og tu sa dkar po'o //
analyzed: 'og tu sa dkar po'o //
translated: Below is the white earth.

original: rlung gi khams kyi 'khor lo la ral gri'i phreng ba dang / 'khor lo'i rtsibs nag po ste 'og tu sa ser po'o //
analyzed: rlung gi khams kyi 'khor lo la ral gri'i phreng ba dang / 'khor lo'i rtsibs nag po ste 'og tu sa ser po'o //
translated: In the wheel of the wind element, the sword has a black garland and spokes. Below is the yellow earth.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi 'khor lo la rdo rje phreng ba dang 'khor lo'i rtsibs ljang khu ste /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi 'khor lo la rdo rje phreng ba dang 'khor lo'i rtsibs ljang khu ste /
translated: In the wheel of the space element, the vajra has a green garland and spokes.

original: 'og tu sa sngon po'o //
analyzed: 'og tu sa sngon po'o //
translated: Below is the blue earth.

original: de nas cha drug gis ni tshon gyis ste skyed byed zhal gyi dbang gis zhes pa ni shar dang mer nag po dang / lho dang bden bral du dmar po dang nub dang rlung du ser po dang byang dang dbang ldan du dkar po'o //
analyzed: de nas cha drug gis ni tshon gyis ste skyed byed zhal gyi dbang gis zhes pa ni shar dang mer nag po dang / lho dang bden bral du dmar po dang nub dang rlung du ser po dang byang dang dbang ldan du dkar po'o //
translated: Then, with six parts, by the color, and by the face that generates, that is, in the east and south black, in the south and southwest red, in the west and northwest yellow, in the north and northeast white.

original: sgo'i 'khor lo de bzhin no zhes pa /
analyzed: sgo'i 'khor lo de bzhin no zhes pa /
translated: The wheel of the doors is the same.

original: sgo brgyad kyi mthar dur khrod chen po brgyad kyi 'khor lo rnams dang sgo brgyad kyi bar rnams su dur khrod brgyad kyi 'khor lo rnams te de ltar na dur khrod kyi 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa bcu drug go //
analyzed: sgo brgyad kyi mthar dur khrod chen po brgyad kyi 'khor lo rnams dang sgo brgyad kyi bar rnams su dur khrod brgyad kyi 'khor lo rnams te de ltar na dur khrod kyi 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa bcu drug go //
translated: At the end of the eight doors are the wheels of the eight great charnel grounds, and in the spaces between the eight doors are the wheels of the eight charnel grounds. Thus there are sixteen wheels of the charnel grounds with eight spokes.

original: snying po'i padma'i 'dab ma brgyad la /
analyzed: snying po'i padma'i 'dab ma brgyad la /
translated: On the eight lotus petals of the center

original: lha mo brgyad dang lha mo brgyad kyi bar bar gyi 'dab ma rnams la thod pa bdud rtsis gang ba brgyad do //
analyzed: lha mo brgyad dang lha mo brgyad kyi bar bar gyi 'dab ma rnams la thod pa bdud rtsis gang ba brgyad do //
translated: are the eight goddesses, and on the petals between the eight goddesses are the eight skull cups filled with nectar.

original: 'khor lo drug gi rtsibs brgyad po rnams la gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad dang de bzhin du dpa' bo rnams kyang rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo drug gi rtsibs brgyad po rnams la gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad dang de bzhin du dpa' bo rnams kyang rig par bya'o //
translated: One should know that the forty-eight goddesses, such as the abodes and the adjacent abodes, are on the eight spokes of the six cakras, and likewise the heroes.

original: phyi rol du stegs bul rta babs kyi ka ba'i rtsa bar klu rgyal chen po brgyad dang / sgo'i rta babs la sgeg mo la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: phyi rol du stegs bul rta babs kyi ka ba'i rtsa bar klu rgyal chen po brgyad dang / sgo'i rta babs la sgeg mo la sogs pa'o //
translated: Outside, on the platform, the eight great nāga kings are at the base of the pillars of the gateway, and on the gateway of the door are the goddesses such as Lāsyā.

original: lhag ma sgo la sogs @193b pa'i mtshan nyid ni dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: lhag ma sgo la sogs @193b pa'i mtshan nyid ni dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du rig par bya'o //
translated: The remaining characteristics of the door and so on should be known to be like the Cakrasaṃvara maṇḍala.

original: da ni 'khor lo drug gi rtsibs la sogs pa rnams la lha mo'i sa bon rnams gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni 'khor lo drug gi rtsibs la sogs pa rnams la lha mo'i sa bon rnams gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the seed syllables of the goddesses on the spokes and so on of the six cakras are stated:

original: ring po zhes pa la sogs pa sta /
analyzed: ring po zhes pa la sogs pa sta /
translated: The long and so on.

original: ring po'i dbyangs lnga l'i a'u r'i a'i a'a zhes pa dang / thung du aa ai ri au li zhes pa 'di rnams kyis phye ba sa ta pa ta tsa ka'i sde pa drug po rnams kyi sa sogs stong sogs yi ge rnams so //
analyzed: ring po'i dbyangs lnga l'i a'u r'i a'i a'a zhes pa dang / thung du aa ai ri au li zhes pa 'di rnams kyis phye ba sa ta pa ta tsa ka'i sde pa drug po rnams kyi sa sogs stong sogs yi ge rnams so //
translated: The five long vowels are lā, ā, ū, ṛ, and ai, and the five short vowels are a, i, ri, u, and li. These are the syllables of the earth and so on, the empty and so on, of the six classes of the sat, pat, tsa, ka groups.

original: rlung sogs rtsibs rnams la ring po zhes pa ni /
analyzed: rlung sogs rtsibs rnams la ring po zhes pa ni /
translated: The spokes of wind and so on are long.

original: 'dir ye shes kyi 'khor lo la sa'i sde pa lhag pa'i lha ste da'i sl'i rlung gi rtsibs la'o //
analyzed: 'dir ye shes kyi 'khor lo la sa'i sde pa lhag pa'i lha ste da'i sl'i rlung gi rtsibs la'o //
translated: Here, the earth family is the supreme deity of the wheel of exalted wisdom, and the wind spoke is the wind of the life-force.

original: dbang ldan du w'u dang bden bral du shr'i dang mer sh'i dang sa 'og tu thk'a ste rlung dang / byang gi dur khrod kyi 'khor lo'i dbus su'o //
analyzed: dbang ldan du w'u dang bden bral du shr'i dang mer sh'i dang sa 'og tu thk'a ste rlung dang / byang gi dur khrod kyi 'khor lo'i dbus su'o //
translated: In the northeast, the wind is the syllable vaṃ, in the southwest the syllable śraṃ, in the south the syllable śraḥ, and below the ground the syllable thaḥ.

original: mkha' 'gro ma lnga po 'di rnams ni sdig pa'i dus sbyor gyi dkyil 'khor lnga'i gtso mo ste /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma lnga po 'di rnams ni sdig pa'i dus sbyor gyi dkyil 'khor lnga'i gtso mo ste /
translated: These five dakinis are the chief goddesses of the five mandalas of the evil conjunctions,

original: sems can thams cad kyi sna bug g-yas pa las sdud pa'i rim ngas srog 'bab pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi sna bug g-yas pa las sdud pa'i rim ngas srog 'bab pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are the life-force that flows from the right nostril of all sentient beings through the process of exhalation.

original: de nas gzhu'i dus sbyor la steng du thka ste rlung dang nub kyi dur khrod kyi 'khor lo'i dbus su'o //
analyzed: de nas gzhu'i dus sbyor la steng du thka ste rlung dang nub kyi dur khrod kyi 'khor lo'i dbus su'o //
translated: Then, in the conjunction of the bow, above is the wind syllable thaḥ, in the center of the southern charnel ground wheel.

original: ye shes kyi 'khor lo'i shar gyi rtsibs la shi dang lhor shri dang / byang du wu dang nub tu sli'o zhes pa ni /
analyzed: ye shes kyi 'khor lo'i shar gyi rtsibs la shi dang lhor shri dang / byang du wu dang nub tu sli'o zhes pa ni /
translated: On the eastern spoke of the wheel of exalted wisdom is the syllable śi, in the south the syllable śrī, in the north the syllable vaṃ, and in the west the syllable sli.

original: gzhu'i dus sbyor la g-yon pa'i rtsa nas srog 'bab pa'o //
analyzed: gzhu'i dus sbyor la g-yon pa'i rtsa nas srog 'bab pa'o //
translated: In the Sagittarius [sign], the life-force moves through the left channel.

original: de nas sa'i 'khor lo la ta'i sde pa lhag pa'i lha ste de'i tl'i rlung du'o //
analyzed: de nas sa'i 'khor lo la ta'i sde pa lhag pa'i lha ste de'i tl'i rlung du'o //
translated: Then, in the earth mandala, the Tīrtha are the secondary deities, and their wind is in the Tṛ element.

original: dbang ldan du th'u dang bden bral du dr'i dang mer dh'i dang / sa 'og tu n'a ste rlung gi sgo'i dur khrod kyi 'khor lo'i dbus su'o //
analyzed: dbang ldan du th'u dang bden bral du dr'i dang mer dh'i dang / sa 'og tu n'a ste rlung gi sgo'i dur khrod kyi 'khor lo'i dbus su'o //
translated: In the northeast, the Tu; in the southwest, the Dra; in the south, the Dha; and in the nadir, the Na.

original: zhes pa ni bu mo'i dus sbyor la'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni bu mo'i dus sbyor la'o //
translated: This is in the female Sagittarius [sign].

original: de bzhin du srang la steng du na ste nub kyi sgor ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du srang la steng du na ste nub kyi sgor ro //
translated: Similarly, in the Libra [sign], the Na is above, in the west.

original: shar du dhi dang lhor dri dang byang du thu dang nub tu tli'o //
analyzed: shar du dhi dang lhor dri dang byang du thu dang nub tu tli'o //
translated: In the east, the Dhi; in the south, the Dri; in the north, the Thu; and in the west, the Tli.

original: de nas chu'i khams kyi 'khor lo la pa'i sde pa lhag pa'i lha ste de'i pl'i rlung du'o //
analyzed: de nas chu'i khams kyi 'khor lo la pa'i sde pa lhag pa'i lha ste de'i pl'i rlung du'o //
translated: Then, in the water mandala, the Bhadra are the secondary deities, and their wind is in the Pal element.

original: dbang ldan du ph'u dang bden bral du br'i dang ser bhi dang sa 'og tu m'a ste dbang ldan gyi sgo ru'o //
analyzed: dbang ldan du ph'u dang bden bral du br'i dang ser bhi dang sa 'og tu m'a ste dbang ldan gyi sgo ru'o //
translated: In the northeast, the Phu; in the southwest, the Bra; in the south, the Bhi; and in the nadir, the Ma, in the northeast gate.

original: de ltar karka ta'i dus sbyor la lhag pa'i lha rnams so //
analyzed: de ltar karka ta'i dus sbyor la lhag pa'i lha rnams so //
translated: Thus, the secondary deities are in the Cancer [sign].

original: de bzhin du seng ge'i dus sbyor la nam mkhar ma ste byang gi sgo ru'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du seng ge'i dus sbyor la nam mkhar ma ste byang gi sgo ru'o //
translated: Likewise, in the Leo period, in the north, in the north door.

original: shar gyi rtsibs la bhi dang lhor bra dang byang du phu dang nub tu pli'o //🔽de nas me'i 'khor lo la ta'i sde pa /
analyzed: shar gyi rtsibs la bhi dang lhor bra dang byang du phu dang nub tu pli'o // de nas me'i 'khor lo la ta'i sde pa /
translated: In the east, the Bhi, in the south, the Bhra, in the north, the Phu, in the west, the Pli.

original: lhag pa'i lha ste de'i tl'i rlung gi rtsibs la'o //
analyzed: lhag pa'i lha ste de'i tl'i rlung gi rtsibs la'o //
translated: Then, in the fire mandala, the T group, the special deity, in the Tla wind petal.

original: @194a * // dbang ldan du sh'u dang bden bral du dr'i dang mer dr'i dang sa 'og tu n'a ste /
analyzed: @194a * // dbang ldan du sh'u dang bden bral du dr'i dang mer dr'i dang sa 'og tu n'a ste /
translated: In the northeast, the Shu, in the southwest, the Dra, in the southeast, the Dhra, in the northwest, the Na.

original: bden bral gyi sgo ru zhes pa glang gi dus sbyor la'o //
analyzed: bden bral gyi sgo ru zhes pa glang gi dus sbyor la'o //
translated: In the southwest door, in the Ox period.

original: de nas 'khrig pa la steng du na ste //
analyzed: de nas 'khrig pa la steng du na ste //
translated: Then, in the sex, above, the Na.

original: lho'i sgo'i dur khrod du'o //
analyzed: lho'i sgo'i dur khrod du'o //
translated: In the south door, in the cemetery.

original: shar gyi rtsibs la dhi dang / lhor tri dang byang du thu dang nub tu tli'o ;🔽/ de nas rlung gi 'khor lo la tsa'i sde pa lhag pa'i lha ste /
analyzed: shar gyi rtsibs la dhi dang / lhor tri dang byang du thu dang nub tu tli'o ; / de nas rlung gi 'khor lo la tsa'i sde pa lhag pa'i lha ste /
translated: In the east petal, the Dhi, in the south, the Tri, in the north, the Thu, in the west, the Tli.

original: de'i tsl'i rlung gi rtsibs la'o //
analyzed: de'i tsl'i rlung gi rtsibs la'o //
translated: Then, in the wind mandala, the Ts group, the special deity, in the Tsa wind petal.🔽In the northeast, the Shu, in the southwest, the Dra, in the southeast, the Dhra, in the northwest, the Na.

original: dbang ldan du tsh'u dang bden bral du dzr'i dang / mer dzh'i dang sa 'og tu ny'a ste me'i sgo ru'o zhes pa nya'i dus sbyor la'o //
analyzed: dbang ldan du tsh'u dang bden bral du dzr'i dang / mer dzh'i dang sa 'og tu ny'a ste me'i sgo ru'o zhes pa nya'i dus sbyor la'o //
translated: In the northeast, the “teeth” (tsau) and in the southwest, the “jar” (dzra), in the southeast, the “m” (mra) and in the nadir, the “na” (na), that is, in the south, in the center of the charnel ground wheel of the fire door.

original: de nas lug gi dus sbyor la steng du nya ste shar gyi sgo'i dur khrod kyi 'khor lo la'o //
analyzed: de nas lug gi dus sbyor la steng du nya ste shar gyi sgo'i dur khrod kyi 'khor lo la'o //
translated: Then, in the Aries period, the “na” (na) above, that is, in the east, in the center of the charnel ground wheel of the east door.

original: shar gyi rtsibs la dznyi dang / lhor dzri dang / byang du tshu dang / nub tu tsli'o //
analyzed: shar gyi rtsibs la dznyi dang / lhor dzri dang / byang du tshu dang / nub tu tsli'o //
translated: On the eastern spoke, the “j” (jña); in the south, the “j” (jra); in the north, the “ts” (tsau); and in the west, the “c” (cli).

original: de nas nam mkha'i khams kyi 'khor lo la ka'i sde pa lhag pa'i lha ste /
analyzed: de nas nam mkha'i khams kyi 'khor lo la ka'i sde pa lhag pa'i lha ste /
translated: Then, in the sky element wheel, the “ka” (ka) group is the supreme deity.

original: de'i kl'i rlung gi rtsibs la'o //🔽dbang ldan du kh'u dang bden bral du gr'i dang mer gh'i dang 'og tu d'a ste me dang lho'i sgo'i dbus kyi dur khrod kyi 'khor lo'i steng du'o zhes pa chu srin gyi dus sbyor la'o //
