analyzed: aom tree lo kya bi dza ya y'a badzre hum h'um phat ces pa la'o //
translated: OṂ TRILO KYAVIJAYA YĀ VAJRA HŪM HŪM PHAṬ is for the Pisces ingress.

original: aom ma h'a b'i re shva ra aa badzre hum h'um phat ces pa lug la'o //
analyzed: aom ma h'a b'i re shva ra aa badzre hum h'um phat ces pa lug la'o //
translated: OṂ MAHĀVĪREŚVARĀVA VAJRA HŪM HŪM PHAṬ is for the Aries ingress.

original: aom badzra bhee ra ba ha: badzre hum h'um phat ces pa glang la'o //🔽aom badzra k'a ya aa: badzre hum h'um ces pa 'khrig pa la'o //🔽aom badzra g'a tra hom badzre hum h'um phat ces pa ka rka ta la'o //
analyzed: aom badzra bhee ra ba ha: badzre hum h'um phat ces pa glang la'o // aom badzra k'a ya aa: badzre hum h'um ces pa 'khrig pa la'o // aom badzra g'a tra hom badzre hum h'um phat ces pa ka rka ta la'o //
translated: OṂ VAJRA BHAIRAVA HA VAJRA HŪM HŪM PHAṬ is for the Taurus ingress.🔽OṂ VAJRA KĀYA A VAJRA HŪM HŪM PHAṬ is for the Gemini ingress.🔽OṂ VAJRA GĀTRA HOṂ VAJRA HŪM HŪM PHAṬ is for the Cancer ingress.

original: aom badzra na tra aom badzre hum h'um phat ces pa seng ge la'o //
analyzed: aom badzra na tra aom badzre hum h'um phat ces pa seng ge la'o //
translated: OṂ VAJRA NĀTHA OṂ VAJRA HŪM HŪM PHAṬ is for the Leo ingress.

original: aom badzra shro tra h'a badzre hum h'um phat ces pa bu mo'i 'pho ba la'o //
analyzed: aom badzra shro tra h'a badzre hum h'um phat ces pa bu mo'i 'pho ba la'o //
translated: Oṃ vajra śrotra hā vajre hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ is for the transference of the girl.

original: aom badzra ghr'a na ha badzre hum h'um phat ces pa srang la'o //
analyzed: aom badzra ghr'a na ha badzre hum h'um phat ces pa srang la'o //
translated: Oṃ vajra ghrāṇa hā vajre hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ is for the scales.

original: aom badzra dzi hva ksh'a badzre hum h'um phat ces pa sdig pa la'o //
analyzed: aom badzra dzi hva ksh'a badzre hum h'um phat ces pa sdig pa la'o //
translated: Oṃ vajra jihvā kṣā vajre hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ is for the sin.

original: aom badzra danta ksha badzre hum h'um phat ces pa gzhu'i 'pho ba la dbugs dang lhan cig bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: aom badzra danta ksha badzre hum h'um phat ces pa gzhu'i 'pho ba la dbugs dang lhan cig bzlas par bya'o //
translated: Oṃ vajra danta kṣā vajre hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ is for the transference of the bow, to be recited together with the breath.

original: zhes pa ste 'pho ba bcu gnyis la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi bzlas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ste 'pho ba bcu gnyis la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi bzlas pa'o //
translated: Thus, for the twelve transferences, there is the recitation of the maṇḍala of wisdom.

original: aom badzra na kha kl'i badzre ghi badzra hum h'um phat ces pa chu srin gyi sa'i dkyil 'khor la rkang pa dang bcas pa'i bcu gcig gis dman pa'i sum brgya drug cu bzlas te /
analyzed: aom badzra na kha kl'i badzre ghi badzra hum h'um phat ces pa chu srin gyi sa'i dkyil 'khor la rkang pa dang bcas pa'i bcu gcig gis dman pa'i sum brgya drug cu bzlas te /
translated: Oṃ vajra naḍa klai vajre ghrī vajra hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ is for the maṇḍala of the earth of the crocodile, recited with the feet and eleven less than three hundred and sixty.

original: de ltar thams cad du dkyil 'khor drug cu po rnams la'o //
analyzed: de ltar thams cad du dkyil 'khor drug cu po rnams la'o //
translated: Thus, for all the sixty maṇḍalas.

original: aom badzra ke sha kh'u badzre gri badzra hum h'um phat ces pa chu la'o //
analyzed: aom badzra ke sha kh'u badzre gri badzra hum h'um phat ces pa chu la'o //
translated: Oṃ vajra keśa khau vajre grī vajra hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ is for the water.

original: aom badzra lo ma gr'i badzre khu badzra hum h'um phat ces pa me la'o //🔽aom badzra bha ra na ghi badzre badzra hum h'um phat ces pa rlung la'o //
analyzed: aom badzra lo ma gr'i badzre khu badzra hum h'um phat ces pa me la'o // aom badzra bha ra na ghi badzre badzra hum h'um phat ces pa rlung la'o //
translated: Oṃ vajra-loka-garbhe khu vajra hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ is for the fire.🔽Oṃ vajra-bharaṇa-garbhe vajra hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ is for the wind.

original: aom badzra h'a sa d'a badzre hum h'um phat ces pa nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la dur khrod du'o //
analyzed: aom badzra h'a sa d'a badzre hum h'um phat ces pa nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la dur khrod du'o //
translated: Oṃ vajra-hāsadā-garbhe hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ is for the mandala of the sky in the charnel ground.

original: thabs ni bcom ldan @201a * //
analyzed: thabs ni bcom ldan @201a * //
translated: The method is the Bhagavān,

original: 'das te des na sa bon gnyis pa med do //
analyzed: 'das te des na sa bon gnyis pa med do //
translated: and therefore there is no second seed.

original: de ltar nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la thams cad shes par bya'o //🔽aom badzra g'i ta nga badzre hum h'um phat ces pa bum pa'i nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la dbugs kyi bzlas pa'o //🔽aom badzra nri tya ghi badzre kl'i badzra hum h'um phat ces pa rlung la'o //
analyzed: de ltar nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la thams cad shes par bya'o // aom badzra g'i ta nga badzre hum h'um phat ces pa bum pa'i nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la dbugs kyi bzlas pa'o // aom badzra nri tya ghi badzre kl'i badzra hum h'um phat ces pa rlung la'o //
translated: Thus, everything should be understood in the mandala of the sky.🔽Oṃ vajra-gītā-garbhe hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ is the recitation of the breath in the mandala of the sky in the vase.🔽Oṃ vajra-nṛtyā-garbhe kīli vajra hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ is for the wind.

original: aom badzr'a yu dha ka ra gri badzre kh'u badzre hum h'um phat ces pa me la'o //
analyzed: aom badzr'a yu dha ka ra gri badzre kh'u badzre hum h'um phat ces pa me la'o //
translated: Oṃ vajra-āyudha-garbhe khā vajra hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ is for the fire.

original: aom badzre kro dh'a dh'i pa ti khu badzre gr'i badzra hum h'um phat ces pa chu la'o //
analyzed: aom badzre kro dh'a dh'i pa ti khu badzre gr'i badzra hum h'um phat ces pa chu la'o //
translated: Oṃ vajra-krodha-dhipati kṣubhaya vajra gṛha vajra hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ is for the water.

original: aom badzra d'a ka kli badzre gh'i badzre hum h'um phat ces pa sa'i dkyil 'khor la dbugs kyi bzlas pa'o //
analyzed: aom badzra d'a ka kli badzre gh'i badzre hum h'um phat ces pa sa'i dkyil 'khor la dbugs kyi bzlas pa'o //
translated: Oṃ vajra-dākinī kṣubhaya vajra gṛha vajra hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ is for the earth mandala, the exhalation.

original: de ltar ka sde la gnas pa rnams so //
analyzed: de ltar ka sde la gnas pa rnams so //
translated: Thus, those abiding in the ka group.

original: de nas nya la aom badzra d'a ki n'i dz'a la pa ri pri ta tsal'a badzre dzhi badzre hum h'um phat ces pa sa'i dkyil 'khor la dbugs kyi bzlas pa'o //
analyzed: de nas nya la aom badzra d'a ki n'i dz'a la pa ri pri ta tsal'a badzre dzhi badzre hum h'um phat ces pa sa'i dkyil 'khor la dbugs kyi bzlas pa'o //
translated: Then, on the new moon day, Oṃ vajra-dākinī jvalapariprītacalā vajra jṛṃbhaya vajra hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ is for the earth mandala, the exhalation.

original: aom sh'i ghra m'a gtstsha gtstsha tsh'u badzre dzri badzre hum h'um phat ces pa chu la'o //
analyzed: aom sh'i ghra m'a gtstsha gtstsha tsh'u badzre dzri badzre hum h'um phat ces pa chu la'o //
translated: Oṃ śṛṅga mā gaccha gaccha tsu vajra jṛṃbhaya vajra hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ is for the water.

original: aom badzra sa tv'a dzny'a y'a sarba m'a ra bi ghna bi n'a ya ka ko na na ra kim pu ru sha ga ru da gan dha rba yaksha r'a ksha sa bh'u ta ma h'a pre ta kum bh'a nd'a pa sm'a ra kshe ta p'a la be t'a
analyzed: aom badzra sa tv'a dzny'a y'a sarba m'a ra bi ghna bi n'a ya ka ko na na ra kim pu ru sha ga ru da gan dha rba yaksha r'a ksha sa bh'u ta ma h'a pre ta kum bh'a nd'a pa sm'a ra kshe ta p'a la be t'a
translated: Oṃ vajrasattva jñāyā sarva māra-vighna-vināyaka-ko na na ra kiṃ puruṣa garuḍa gandharva yakṣa rākṣasa bhūta-mahā-preta-kumbhāṇḍa-apa-samāra-kṣetrapāla-vetāla-piśāca-kūṣmāṇḍa-pūtana-skanda-kumāra-kārttikeya-gaṇa-āditya-vasu-rudra-marut-ādhidevatā hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā is for the fire.

original: d'a p'u ta na du shta n'a ga gra h'a da yo ye sarba dzva ra sarba by'a dhi bhi: kshu dro pa dra ba k'a ri na: sarba sa tv'a pa k'a ra ra t'a: t'a na sarb'a na dza: sh'i ghram badzr'am ku she n'a gri shy'a dzr'i badzre
analyzed: d'a p'u ta na du shta n'a ga gra h'a da yo ye sarba dzva ra sarba by'a dhi bhi: kshu dro pa dra ba k'a ri na: sarba sa tv'a pa k'a ra ra t'a: t'a na sarb'a na dza: sh'i ghram badzr'am ku she n'a gri shy'a dzr'i badzre

original: tshu phat ces pa me'i dkyil 'khor la 'khor la'o //

translated: The mantra for the fire maṇḍala is Oṃ, burn, burn!🔽All the afflictions and all the illnesses, destroy, destroy!🔽All beings are liberated, liberated!🔽All suffering is pacified, pacified!🔽 The mantra for the wind maṇḍala is Oṃ, cut, cut!🔽All the afflictions and all the illnesses, cut, cut!🔽 The mantra for the space maṇḍala is Oṃ, destroy, destroy!
